meanings.definition: A thing characteristic of its kind or illustrating a general rule.
meanings.sent1: In the science class, the teacher showed us many examples of different animals.
meanings.sent2: She collected various examples of leaves to show the different shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent3: The examples of fruits in the grocery store were all wearing tiny hats.
meanings.sent4: The rainbow after the storm was a beautiful example of nature's wonders.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's bravery was a shining example of selflessness.

meanings.definition: A person or thing regarded in terms of their fitness to be imitated or the likelihood of their being imitated.
meanings.sent1: The famous singer was considered an example of talent and hard work.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's dedication and discipline made him a great example for young athletes.
meanings.sent3: The example of the dancing cat on TV made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an example that warmed the hearts of all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The old tree in the park stood tall, a perfect example of resilience.
